items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Good Staple Dress that should be in every closet
items.body: I love this dress. It is true to size, fits nicely, is very flattering, and makes me feel like a million bucks. I've worn it twice, to 2 very different types of events, with very different vibes, and I received a ton of compliments at both. The material is a tad bit thinner than my ideal, but it's no where near close to see through. I am very happy with the color. I thought the price was fair. I would buy this dress a hundred times over. Read more
items.author: girlstailgatetoo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering! Must buy!
items.body: This dress is stunning. I own this in the brick red and a year later I ordered the medium blue. I tried on the navy as well and it's beautiful but definitely felt more formal (which wasn't what I needed). Every single time I wear it I am given compliments - it really flatters an hourglass figure (even if you have a bigger bottom). It doesn't wrinkle easily, has a nice stretchy but isn't too thin or thick. Two things: It comes with a clasp to hold the front together, and I love that, but I preferred it a bit more modest so I crossed it further and added one stitch higher up and it hid easily in the seam. 2nd: the sleeves are a little long, so again I folded them under and added a tiny stitch on either side of the wrist to hold them in place. Absolutely worth it for how comfortable and versatile this dress is. I used a microstitch gun (tons on Amazon) to do it while I had it on :). 10/10 recommend. I wish I could have it in ever color. Read more
items.author: Ashley Andrasko

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: I’m 5’4” and 145 lbs and got a medium — the fit was perfect! I grabbed this dress last minute to wear to a wedding, and it ended up being such a great choice. It’s super comfortable, flattering, and easy to move in. The only thing I’d change is the silver button on the chest — I wish it was black so it didn’t stand out as much Read more
items.author: Susan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and Comfortable
items.body: Both Comfortable and Sexy. Hugs the waist gives the curves for a curvy girl. Material is soft even after multiple washes. Can wear at a datenight and feel confident. Read more
items.author: Sierra

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very thin stretchy material
items.body: This dress was very beautiful, but I think it would’ve looked better on somebody thin, which I am not. I was looking for a funeral dress and I thought this look nice but they fit is tied to the body and since is a knead kind of material it didn’t look good on me. Read more
items.author: p

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering dress
items.body: This is a really flattering sweater dress! The material is slightly thin but not too thin—it skims over curves rather than emphasizing bulges. It’s a nice midi length on me (I’m 5’5”). I am between sizes and I went with the large rather than a medium. I’m glad I did because it fits perfectly through the bust (I have a large bust) with no gaping or need to tug. I got the dark brown but I might buy another color, too. Read more
items.author: Elstree6517

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY PLEASED!
items.body: Love the style of the dress. The only thing it was a tad too low neck for my taste. Reasonably priced and it fit well. Read more
items.author: V. Robinson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Chemical smell, but perfect dress
items.body: Bought this for a funeral. Appreciate that there was a button to cover more chest as I was hoping for modesty at catholic funeral. It had a strong chemical smell that took 3 washes to get out and I could still smell it but had no choice. The fit was great, perfect even. The material was soft and stretchy, very comfortable for an all day event. I did not need to steam it, no wrinkles! Read more
items.author: Danielle Falco

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine Red, Blue, 4186-drakred, Black, 4186-dark Khaki, Navy Blue, 4186-brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
